#include<stdio.h>
#define LL long long
 
main()
{
int i,s,t,n,c,l,b,h,x=0;
int test[100];
scanf("%d",&c);
while(c!=0)
{
        test[x]=c;
			x++;
			scanf("%d",&c);
			
			
} 
for(h=0;h<x;h++)
		{
			
			n=test[h];
			LL p[n+1][n+1];
			for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
			{
				
				p[0][i] =1;
			}
			for(s=1;s<=n;s++)
			{
				for(t=s;t<=n;t++)
				{
					if(s==t)
					{
						b=s;
						p[b][t]=0;
						l=t-1;
						
						while(b>0)
						{
							p[s][t] = (p[s][t]+p[b-1][l])%761238923;
							b--;
						}
						
					}
					else
					{
						b=s;
						p[b][t]=0;
						l=t-1;
						while(b>=0)
						{
							p[s][t] = (p[s][t]+p[b][l])%761238923;
							b--;
						}
					}
				}
			}
			printf("%lld\n",p[n][n]);
		}
 
return 0;
}
